body_html: @peterjc123 C++ compilers are supposed to be quite good at inferring arguments for function templates based on their arguments, and in this case it really is easy (just take the type of the 3rd arg), but of course it's possible that MSVC doesn't conform to that.
body_text: @peterjc123 C++ compilers are supposed to be quite good at inferring arguments for function templates based on their arguments, and in this case it really is easy (just take the type of the 3rd arg), but of course it's possible that MSVC doesn't conform to that.
body: @peterjc123 C++ compilers [are supposed to be quite good at inferring arguments for function templates based on their arguments](http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/language/template_argument_deduction), and in this case it really is easy (just take the type of the 3rd arg), but of course it's possible that MSVC doesn't conform to that.
